entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Souris
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.0°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %

Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: E 29 km/h gust 42 km/h

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 5.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
